pkgmetadata.longdescription: unixcw is package of libraries and programs that fit together to form a morse code tutor program. It provides the general purpose 'libcw' library with functions to generate Morse code characters and a frontend program 'cw' to convert text strings to morse code ooutput via soundcard or console speaker. It further provides a set of Morse Code tutor programs (see USE flag description).

use.flag: Enables building the curses based morse code tutor program 'cwcp'.
Enables building the Qt based morse code tutor program 'xcwcp'.
